ISSUE.TITLE: Post parent read from incorrect key
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When setting a post parent, the value is currently pulled from the `post_parent` key, not the `parent` key.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #226 from WP-API/fix-excerpt-errors Fix errors with excerpt. Closes #226.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #231 from WP-API/check-post-parent Check post parent correctly on insertion. Closes #228.
Don't skip parent tests Now that #228 has been fixed, we can reenable these.
